TopicTitle: Longtime Orbiter fan, just got into KSB

Articles.Content:
And I love it.

A while back I was really into Orbiter2010, but found it hard to keep myself entertained once I learned how to execute a multiple slingshot maneuver. After going from Earth and landing on Titan via a Jupiter sling, there isn't much else to do but do it more efficiently. And by then it got tedious...

But KSP is just pure fun. It's really everything I wanted to compliment an orbital sim with the extreme focus on realism over entertainment.

And since I already learned everything I would ever want to know about orbital mechanics, I can fire up Mechjeb with a clear conscience and watch my fireworks in action

The modding community here is incredible, so I wanted to give a general thanks for the developers here.

Any other Orbiter folks here? I would imagine I am not alone.
Hi there Sternface, there are many orbiter players around, I think there is an orbiter topic in the Space Lounge as well. Enjoy your time here
